question.title: Question
question.description: Your question about the meeting notes/interviews

index_name.description: Name of the Pinecone index containing your embeddings

threshold.description: Minimum similarity score for retrieved documents (0.0-1.0)

recency_weight.description: How much to favor recent documents (0.0 = only similarity, 1.0 = only recency, 0.2 = balanced)

recency_decay_days.description: Half-life for recency scoring - documents this many days old get 50% recency score
